#summary What's with the monster names?
#labels Featured,Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation


= Versions =

*SEKATI API* adheres to a loose version schema: _Release.Major.Minor.Maintenance_ - _"Code Name"_ (the code name generally being specific to the minor version) which is more memorable & useful in recalling which version a specific project should be compiled against. 

API constants may be located in the [http://code.google.com/p/sekati/source/browse/trunk/src/sekati/core/App.as sekati.core.App] class and will be display in the context menu of API application (if configured via `<menu verbose="true">true</menu>`) to assist you in locating the proper version to compile against.
